about.title: About Us
about.companyDesc: Shanghai Xiaoling Biomedical Technology Co., Ltd. (X-AGEING) was founded in January 2025, headquartered in Zhangjiang Science City, Shanghai, with angel investment from OBiO Technology. The company focuses on R&D and application of exosome technology and AI digital twins in anti-aging, committed to becoming a global leader in precision anti-aging solutions.
about.missionDesc: Centered on 'Exosome-Based Balanced Anti-Aging', leveraging the natural intercellular communication mechanism of exosomes to achieve precise regulation and multi-system balanced repair of the human aging process.
about.marketDesc: Deep focus on the intersection of anti-aging and regenerative medicine, serving medical aesthetics clinics, premium health check centers, top-tier hospitals, and consumer brands with end-to-end solutions from assessment to intervention.
advantageItems: AI Digital Twin Biological Age Assessment System
Top-Tier Hospital Joint Clinical Research Network
about.teamDesc: World-class scientists and industry experts, cross-disciplinary expertise in exosome engineering and AI biological modeling
about.certsDesc: Comprehensive qualification system ensuring R&D and production compliance
about.patentsDesc: Proprietary intellectual property building core technology moats
about.partnersDesc: Deep collaborations with leading hospitals, research institutes, and industry capital
partnerList: Shanghai Shenzer Venture Capital Management Co., Ltd.
Shanghai Jiao Tong University School of Medicine
CAS Center for Excellence in Molecular Cell Science

products.title: Products & Solutions
products.subtitle: Technology-driven, building full-scenario anti-aging solutions
products.product1Desc: Building personal digital twin models through multi-omics data (genomics, proteomics, metabolomics), precisely assessing biological age, aging rate, and organ function status to tailor personalized anti-aging plans for each user.
products.product2Desc: Proprietary exosome engineering platform enabling efficient isolation, purification, functional modification, and scaled production. Products include skin rejuvenation serums, joint repair preparations, and neuroprotective factors.

solution1.title: Medical Aesthetics Solution
solution1.desc: Providing clinics with a closed-loop anti-aging service: Assessment → Custom Plan → Exosome Products → Outcome Tracking

solution2.title: Health Check Center Solution
solution2.desc: AI biological age assessment + anti-aging intervention plans, upgrading health centers with 'Health Management + Precision Anti-Aging' services

solution3.title: Hospital Clinical Research
solution3.desc: Multi-center clinical research in anti-aging and regenerative medicine with top-tier hospitals, driving translational outcomes

solution4.title: Brand Co-Development
solution4.desc: Providing exosome raw materials and technical support for consumer brands to jointly develop premium anti-aging skincare/health product lines

products.pipelineDesc: Multiple parallel pipelines covering skin rejuvenation, joint repair, neurodegenerative diseases and more
